TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FtpWebResponse extends System.Net.WebResponse

summary.span: 封装文件传输协议 (FTP) 服务器对请求的响应。

span.span: Encapsulates a File Transfer Protocol (FTP) server's response to a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例通过调用获取方法。Instances of are obtained by calling the method. 返回的对象必须强制转换为。The returned object must be cast to an . 当你的应用程序不再需要对象，请调用方法释放由持有的资源。When your application no longer needs the object, call the method to free the resources held by the . 属性包含服务器返回的状态代码和属性返回的状态代码和描述的状态消息。The property contains the status code returned by the server, and the property returns the status code and a message that describes the status. 当服务器返回的消息，返回两个属性值发生更改。The values returned by these properties change as the messages are returned by the server. 该请求返回的例如为的文件名称列表返回任何数据请求，返回的流中提供了方法。Any data returned by the request, such as the list of file names returned for a request, is available in the stream returned by the method. 可以从获取的流数据的长度属性。The length of the stream data can be obtained from the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送请求以删除 FTP 服务器上的文件，并显示来自服务器的请求响应的状态消息。The following code example sends a request to delete a file on an FTP server and displays the status message from the server's response to the request. 有关其他示例，请参阅的成员和类。For additional examples, see the members of the and classes. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BannerMessage As String
public: property System::String ^ BannerMessage { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在登录前建立连接时 FTP 服务器发送的消息。

span.span: Gets the message sent by the FTP server when a connection is established prior to logon.

value.span: ，它包含服务器发送的标语消息；如果没有发送任何消息，则为 。

span.span: A that contains the banner message sent by the server; otherwise, if no message is sent.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclFtpClient#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NclFtpClient#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 释放响应所持有的资源。

span.span: Frees the resources held by the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法关闭返回的数据流方法如果属性是`false`。The method closes the data stream returned by the method if the property is `false`. 在结束时，数据可能会被发送到上的控制连接的服务器。During the close, data might be sent to the server on the control connection. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例在服务器上，下载数据的响应流中读取数据，然后关闭它。The following code example downloads data from a server, reads the data from the response stream, and then closes it. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ContentLength As Long
public: virtual property long ContentLength { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取从 FTP 服务器上接收的数据的长度。

span.span: Gets the length of the data received from the FTP server.

value.span: 值，它包含从 FTP 服务器上接收的数据的字节数。

span.span: An value that contains the number of bytes of data received from the FTP server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks FTP 服务器返回响应流时属性包含的流中的字节数。When a response stream is returned by the FTP server, the property contains the number of bytes in the stream. 如果在响应中未返回任何数据，或者服务器未发送内容长度的信息，请不返回 − 1。 returns −1 if no data was returned in the response or if the server did not send content length information. 返回值是大于或等于零，如果数据应返回。The return value is greater than or equal to zero if data was or should have been returned. 例如，对于序列化请求使用字段，属性始终返回 − 1。For example, for requests that use the field, the property always returns −1. 对于序列化请求使用方法，属性始终为零。For requests that use the method, the property is always zero. 对于序列化请求使用方法，如果该属性为大于零下载的文件包含数据，并且如果它为空，则为零。For requests that use the method, the property is greater than zero if the downloaded file contained data and is zero if it was empty. 对于序列化请求使用方法，返回服务器上的指定文件的大小。For requests that use the method, returns the size of the specified file on the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例下载从指定的 FTP 服务器上的文件。The following code example downloads a file from on the specified FTP server. 此属性包含下载的文件中的字节数。This property contains the number of bytes in the downloaded file. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ContentType As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ContentType { System::String ^ get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property ExitMessage As String
public: property System::String ^ ExitMessage { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 FTP 会话结束时服务器发送的消息。

span.span: Gets the message sent by the server when the FTP session is ending.

value.span: ，它包含服务器发送的退出消息；如果没有发送任何消息，则为 。

span.span: A that contains the exit message sent by the server; otherwise, if no message is sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不可用，直到服务器的连接被关闭或重复使用。The property is not available until the connection to the server is closed or reused. 如果属性是`true`，此请求使用的连接未关闭，这可阻止服务器发送退出消息。If the property is `true`, the connection used by this request is not closed, which prevents the server from sending an exit message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclFtpClient#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NclFtpClient#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IO.Stream GetResponseStream() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetResponseStream () As Stream

summary.span: 检索包含从 FTP 服务器上发送的响应数据的流。

span.span: Retrieves the stream that contains response data sent from an FTP server.

returns.span: 可读取的 实例，它包含与响应一起返回的数据；如果服务器未返回任何响应数据，则为 。

span.span: A readable instance that contains data returned with the response; otherwise, if no response data was returned by the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 读取数据之后, 必须关闭的流。After reading the data, you must close the stream. 在关闭时自动关闭流包含它的对象。The stream is automatically closed when you close the object that contains it. 除非请求方法是，将引发异常或。An exception is thrown unless the request method is or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何获取的响应流请求。The following code example demonstrates getting the response stream for a request. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#1)]

span.span: The response did not return a data stream.

span.span: Gets an empty object.
An empty object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅为使用的其他实现的兼容性提供属性和类。The property is provided only for compatibility with other implementations of the and classes.

public: property DateTime LastModified { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取上次修改 FTP 服务器上的文件的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the date and time that a file on an FTP server was last modified.

value.span: ，它包含文件的上次修改日期和时间。

span.span: A that contains the last modified date and time for a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回所请求的数据方法。The property returns the data requested by the method. 使用任何其他方法，发送的请求返回。For requests sent using any other method, returns . ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的日期和时间，上次修改 FTP 服务器上的文件。The following code example displays the date and time that a file on an FTP server was last modified. [!code-cpp[NclFtpClient#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[NclFtpClient#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#21)]

summary.span: 获取对请求发送响应的 URI。

span.span: Gets the URI that sent the response to the request.

value.span: 实例，它标识与此响应关联的资源。

span.span: A instance that identifies the resource associated with this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于服务器和资源特定的行为，例如重定向，返回的值属性并不总是返回的值相同属性。Because of server- and resource-specific behaviors, such as redirection, the value returned by the property is not always the same as the value returned by the property. 对于序列化请求使用方法，返回服务器上的文件的名称。For requests that use the method, returns the name of the file on the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StatusCode As FtpStatusCode
public: property System::Net::FtpStatusCode StatusCode { System::Net::FtpStatusCode get(); };

summary.span: 获取从 FTP 服务器上发送的最新状态代码。

span.span: Gets the most recent status code sent from the FTP server.

value.span: 值，它指示与此响应一起返回的最新状态代码。

span.span: An value that indicates the most recent status code returned with this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值属性包含在属性。The value returned by the property is included in the property. 当你将下载数据的值更改状态代码返回的 FTP 服务器。When you are downloading data, the value of changes as status codes are returned by the FTP server. 调用后方法，包含中间状态代码。After you call the method, contains an intermediate status code. 当调用方法，包含最终状态。When you call the method, contains the final status. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将文件上载到服务器，并显示状态。The following code example uploads a file to a server and displays the status. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#2)]

summary.span: 获取描述从 FTP 服务器发送的状态代码的文本。

span.span: Gets text that describes a status code sent from the FTP server.

value.span: 实例，它包含状态代码以及与此响应一起返回的消息。

span.span: A instance that contains the status code and message returned with this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的文本属性包括 3 位数字属性值。The text returned by the property includes the 3-digit property value. 在下载数据的值时更改状态代码返回的 FTP 服务器。When downloading data, the value of changes as status codes are returned by the FTP server. 调用后方法，包含中间状态代码。After you call the method, contains an intermediate status code. 当调用方法，包含最终状态。When you call the method, contains the final status. ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送请求以删除 FTP 服务器上的文件，并显示来自服务器的请求响应的状态消息。The following code example sends a request to delete a file on an FTP server and displays the status message from the server's response to the request. summary.span: 获取身份验证完成时 FTP 服务器发送的消息。

span.span: Gets the message sent by the FTP server when authentication is complete.

value.span: ，它包含服务器发送的欢迎消息；如果未发送任何消息，则为 。

span.span: A that contains the welcome message sent by the server; otherwise, if no message is sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果正在重用连接 (属性设置为`true`)，则属性返回与连接收到第一条欢迎消息。If the connection is being reused (the property is set to `true`), the property returns the first welcome message received with the connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property.
